description:
Explore a wide variety of topics, from a farm and a confectionery shop to a laboratory and a medieval castle. 
Finish the levels in new "Layers" modes, where you have to search for the right objects among a various things. 
Overgo the themes in any order - either starting with mini-games or searching for objects, as you like! 
This hidden object game is full of new interesting locations and hidden things. 
Use your search skills and logic to complete puzzles and find all hidden objects.

The collector 's edition includes:
- 5 supplementary themes, accommodating 10 more locations for hidden objects!
- 10 mini games, across all themes
- 14 collector's puzzles that you can collect while playing!
name: Lots Of Things Collector's Edition
intro: Puzzles, mini games and plenty of hidden objects!
